common_0230_rival_01: Este aqui é o hall de entrada![npcn:4]
common_0230_rival_02:
Pode se inscrever para todas as aulas na mesa
atrás de mim, e aqueles corredores para os lados\r
levam as todas as partes da escola.[npcn:4]
common_0230_rival_03:
It’s totally big enough to let loose and battle in
here, but for some reason, they banned Pokémon\r
battling in the main entrance...[npcn:4]
common_0230_head_teacher_02: How did you find your first school commute?[npcn:A]
common_0230_head_teacher_02a:
I imagine Miss Nemona’s high spirits helped with
that. She’s a true asset to our fine academy.[npcn:A]
common_0230_head_teacher_02b:
Oh dear, was it really? I suppose Miss Nemona
must have led you on quite the adventure...[npcn:A]
common_0230_head_teacher_03:
Not that I was expecting any less from our
Champion-ranked student council president.\r
Reliable as ever, Miss Nemona.[npcn:A]
common_0230_rival_04:
Well, I know how to look after my friends!
Right, [trnm:0]?[npcn:4]
common_0230_rival_09:
Oh! But speaking of which...we saw some of
those Team Star kids in town, Director![npcn:4]
common_0230_rival_10:
It was down the stairs from the front gates. They
were hassling this kid with an Eevee backpack...[npcn:4]
common_0230_head_teacher_08:
That is quite the news. Are they still to be found
out there?[npcn:A]
common_0230_head_teacher_10:
Of course it’s a fine thing to try to help a fellow
student, M[aster;iss:g] [trnm:0]...\c
But you might wish to show a bit of restraint as
you find your feet here at our academy.[npcn:A]
common_0230_head_teacher_11:
And, Miss Nemona, do remember that the
school’s staff is here to resolve any such troubles.[npcn:A]
common_0230_head_teacher_12:
A child with an Eevee backpack, you say...
I suppose that might have been Miss Penny.\r
I’m relieved to hear she’s come to class, at least.[npcn:A]
common_0230_head_teacher_04:
Ah, and Miss Nemona? If you’d be so good, do
report to Mr. Jacq about this Team Star business.\c
As your homeroom teacher, he should be kept
apprised of all such goings-on.[npcn:A]
common_0230_head_teacher_05:
Ah, but look at the time. You two had better
hurry along—classes will be starting soon.[npcn:A]
common_0230_rival_06:
[BD06:0]We’re in class 1-A, [trnm:0]!
C’mon,\r
I’ll\r
show\r
you\r
the way![npcn:4]
